item.description:
Date: Saturday, June 28, 2008
Time: 12 noon - 6pm
Place: Arsenal Park
485 Arsenal St.
Watertown, MA 02472

Cost - $10 (pay at the picnic registration table)

Join us for our first annual picnic/bbq. We'll have delicious bbq, salads, watermelon and drinks. We've rented a covered picnic area (tables 11, 12, 13). Come and meet other meetup members and have some fun in the sun.

The park also has tennis and basketball courts nearby and we will set up a volleyball net as well. Bring a frisbee, lawn chair or picnic blanket and join us for a good time.

There is free parking. If you need a ride, please note that in your rsvp and someone may be able to give you a ride.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for covered picnic area and group of asians. Picnic tables 11, 12, 13

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Picnic/BBQ
